text.emotional: [happiness, high]A few days later, she phoned our home, and asked me to help her with the project, as she saw me as one of the key players in the community who could tie everything together.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} a few days later she phoned our home {....} and asked me to help her with the project {....} as she saw me as one of the key players in the community {..} who could tie everything together {...}
